_meanings:
{@--3@} To turn to, be
drawn or attracted towards, be
attached to; {#hfdayamadaye taspinnevaM#} 
{#punarvalate balAt#} <ls>Gīt. 7</ls>; <ls>Nalod. 3. 5.</ls>

{@--6@} To be
covered, enclosed or surrounded.
--WITH {#vi#} to move to and fro, roll
about; {#svidyati kURati vellati vivalati#}
{#nimiza te vilAkeyati tiryak#} <ls>K. P. 10.</ls>
